title: Specify plugin version in config
body:
If you specify `<plugin>@next` in config, it works great for `.hyper_plugins/package.json`: `next` is use and not `last`. But Hyper try to access `.hyper_plugins/node_modules/<plugin>@next/` and not 
 `.hyper_plugins/node_modules/<plugin>/`
author: chabou

comments.body: @chabou I'm confused, did you fix this with #2312? Or is help wanted?

Yes! It has been fixed by #2312.
Thank you for your help proposal

satisfaction_conditions: Resolves directory path resolution for version-specified plugins
Maintains compatibility with semantic versioning in plugin configurations
